description: Dashboard showing traffic metrics including request totals, rates, and error percentages with both time series and stat visualizations for MCP Servers

panels.description: Total cumulative requests across all MCP operations
Current request rate in requests per second
Average request payload size in bytes
Average operation duration across all MCP operations
Error percentage calculated over your selected dashboard time range
Average response payload size in bytes
Request patterns showing totals, rates, and error percentage over time
panels.title: Traffic Overview

panels.description: Pie chart showing proportional distribution of MCP methods
panels.title: MCP Methods - Pie Chart

panels.description: Time series showing MCP method request rates over time
panels.title: MCP Methods

panels.description: This panel shows detailed trace information for GenAI requests, including trace IDs, service names, operation names, and durations. Click on trace IDs to view detailed trace analysis and understand request flow through your system.

Instructions for viewing detailed trace information. Click on trace IDs in the traces table, then click the traces link, and refresh the dashboard to see the complete trace visualization with span details.

options.content:
> To View Traces:
>  1. Click the **Trace ID** on the left table .
>  2. Click **Traces link**.
>  1. Refresh the dashboard.

panels.description: This panel displays the selected trace visualization. Use the trace ID variable or click on traces in the table above to view detailed span information, timing, and request flow through your GenAI services.
